source.7affb411:
def read_tsv(data_file):
    text_data = list()
    labels = list()
    infile = open(data_file, encoding='utf-8')
    for line in infile:
        if not line.strip():
            continue
        label, text = line.split('\t')
        text_data.append(text)
        labels.append(label)
    return text_data, labels

###############################################################
